xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates

Class NumericalAggregateND

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.math.functions.AggregationFunction<double[],double[]>
      • xxl.core.math.statistics.parametric.aggregates.NumericalAggregateND
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class NumericalAggregateND
extends AggregationFunction<double[],double[]>
    This class combines a given number of aggregate functions for numerical data to process data of type double [] with aggregate functions consuming objects of type number in one pass. To do so, the results of the aggregation functions are internally stored and combined to objects of type double []. Each column of the returned double [] represents the same column in the given data.

    Objects of this type are recommended for the usage with aggregator cursors!

    Each aggregation function must support a function call of the following type:
    agg_n = f (agg_n-1, next),
    where agg_n denotes the computed aggregation value after n steps, f the aggregation function, agg_n-1 the computed aggregation value after n-1 steps and next the next object to use for computation. An aggregation function delivers only null as aggregation result as long as the aggregation function has not yet fully initialized.
    See OnlineAggregation for further details about aggregation functions using internally stored information.
    See Also:
    Aggregator, Function, OnlineAggregation, Serialized Form

      protected AggregationFunction<Number,Number>[] aggregates1D
      internally used one-dimensional aggregate functions working on numerical data

      dimension of the combination of the numerical aggregate functions

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumericalAggregateND

        public NumericalAggregateND(Function aggregateFunctionFactory)
        Constructs a new object of this class. The dimension of the consumed objects of type double [] needs to match the first consumed object. The factory needs to deliver at least dim aggregate functions to initialize to internally used function [].
        Parameters:
        aggregateFunctionFactory - factory delivering internally used aggregation functions.

      • NumericalAggregateND

        public NumericalAggregateND(AggregationFunction[] aggregateFunctions)
        Constructs a new object of this class. The dimension of the consumed objects of type double [] treated as real-valued vector needs to match the number of given aggregate functions.
        Parameters:
        aggregateFunctions - internally used aggregation functions based on numerical data

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public double[] invoke(double[] previous,
                       double[] next)
        Two-figured function call for supporting aggregation by this function. Each aggregation function must support a function call like agg_n = f (agg_n-1, next), where agg_n denotes the computed aggregation value after n steps, f the aggregation function, agg_n-1 the computed aggregation value after n-1 steps and next the next object to use for computation. This method delivers only null as aggregation result as long as the aggregation has not yet initialized.
        Specified by:
        invoke in class AggregationFunction<double[],double[]>
        Parameters:
        previous - result of the aggregation function in the previous computation step
        next - next object used for computation given as object of type double []
        Returns:
        aggregation value after n steps
